article.title: HTML相关的面试题
article.body: --- title: HTML相关的面试题 date: 2024-02-13 16:50:56 tag: [blog, interview, html] --- ## DOM事件的总结 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/19) ## 五、渲染机制 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/21) ## canvas [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/23) ## WebWorker和postMessage [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/24) ## 四、Service Worker [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/25) ## OffscreenCanvas 离屏Canvas — 使用Web Worker提高你的Canvas运行速度 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/26) ## 前端需要注意哪些 SEO [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/28) ## web 开发中会话跟踪的方法有哪些 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/29) ## ``的`title`和`alt`有什么区别 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/30) ## doctype 是什么,举例常见 doctype 及特点 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/31) ## HTML 全局属性(global attribute)有哪些 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/32) ## 什么是 web 语义化,有什么好处 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/33) ## 什么是渐进增强 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/39) ## DOM 元素 e 的 e.getAttribute(propName)和 e.propName 有什么区别和联系 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/59) ## offsetWidth/offsetHeight,clientWidth/clientHeight 与 scrollWidth/scrollHeight 的区别 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/66) ## focus/blur 与 focusin/focusout 的区别与联系 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/67) ## mouseover/mouseout 与 mouseenter/mouseleave 的区别与联系 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/68) ## 应用程序存储和离线 web 应用 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/73) ## sessionStorage,localStorage,cookie 区别 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/74) ## 客户端存储 localStorage 和 sessionStorage [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/75) ## cookie 及其操作 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/76) ## 介绍chrome 浏览器的几个版本 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/85) ## 事件机制 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/229) ## HTML [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/232) ## JSON和XML [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/239) ## localStorage [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/240) ## Cookie [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/248) ## script阻塞DOM解析 [答案详情](https://github.com/hankliu62/interview/issues/298)
